name: 3d-farm
description: Ceci est un projet de LO10, pour but de montrer l'interaction entre les services.

scripts.all:start: concurrently --names "CA,MA,NO,PR,UI" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgRed.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgYellow.bold,bgCyan.bold" "cd 3d-farm-camservice && npm start" "cd 3d-farm-magasin && npm start" "cd 3d-farm-notification && npm start" "cd 3d-farm-printery && npm start" "cd 3d-farm-web-ui && npm start"
scripts.all:install: concurrently --names "CA,MA,NO,PR,UI" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgRed.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgYellow.bold,bgCyan.bold" "cd 3d-farm-camservice && npm install" "cd 3d-farm-magasin && npm install" "cd 3d-farm-notification && npm install" "cd 3d-farm-printery && npm install" "cd 3d-farm-web-ui && npm install"
